verses.verse: The priests<WH3548> the Levites,<WH3881> and all<WH3605> the tribe<WH7626> of Levi,<WH3878> shall have no<WH3808> part<WH2506> nor inheritance<WH5159> with Israel:<WH3478> they shall eat<WH398> the offerings of the LORD<WH3068> made by fire, and his inheritance.<WH5159>
Therefore shall they have no<WH3808> inheritance<WH5159> among<WH7130> their brothers:<WH251> the LORD<WH3068> is their inheritance,<WH5159> as he has said<WH1696> to them.

And this<WH2088> shall be the priest's<WH3548> due<WH4941> from the people,<WH5971> from them that offer<WH2076> a sacrifice,<WH2077> whether<WH518> it be ox<WH7794> or sheep;<WH7716> and they shall give<WH5414> to the priest<WH3548> the shoulder,<WH2220> and the two cheeks,<WH3895> and the maw.<WH6896>
The first fruit<WH7225> also of your corn,<WH1715> of your wine,<WH8492> and of your oil,<WH3323> and the first<WH7225> of the fleece<WH1488> of your sheep,<WH6629> shall you give<WH5414> him.

For the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> has chosen<WH977> him out of all<WH3605> your tribes,<WH7626> to stand<WH5975> to minister<WH8334> in the name<WH8034> of the LORD,<WH3068> him and his sons<WH1121> for ever.<WH3605> <WH3117>

And if<WH3588> a Levite<WH3881> come<WH935> from any<WH259> of your gates<WH8179> out of all<WH3605> Israel,<WH3478> where<WH834> <WH8033> he sojourned,<WH1481> and come<WH935> with all<WH3605> the desire<WH183> of his mind<WH5315> to the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> shall choose;<WH977>

Then he shall minister<WH8334> in the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068> his God,<WH430> as all<WH3605> his brothers<WH251> the Levites<WH3881> do, which stand<WH5975> there<WH8033> before<WH6440> the LORD.<WH3068>
They shall have like portions<WH2506> to eat,<WH398> beside<WH905> that which comes of the sale<WH4465> of his patrimony.<WH5921> <WH1>

When<WH3588> you are come<WH935> into<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you, you shall not learn<WH3925> to do<WH6213> after the abominations<WH8441> of those<WH1992> nations.<WH1471>

There shall not be found<WH4672> among you any one that makes his son<WH1121> or his daughter<WH1323> to pass<WH5674> through the fire,<WH784> or that uses divination,<WH7081> or an observer<WH6049> of times, or an enchanter,<WH5172> or a witch.<WH3784>
Or a charmer,<WH2266> <WH2267> or a consulter<WH7592> with familiar spirits,<WH178> or a wizard,<WH3049> or a necromancer.<WH1875> <WH4191>

For all<WH3605> that do<WH6213> these<WH428> things are an abomination<WH8441> to the LORD:<WH3068> and because<WH1558> of these<WH428> abominations<WH8441> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> does drive<WH3423> them out from before<WH6440> you.
You shall be perfect<WH8549> with the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

For these<WH428> nations,<WH1471> which<WH834> you shall possess,<WH3423> listened<WH8085> to observers<WH6049> of times, and to diviners:<WH7080> but as for you, the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> has not suffered<WH5414> you so<WH3651> to do.
The LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> will raise<WH6965> up to you a Prophet<WH5030> from the middle<WH7130> of you, of your brothers,<WH251> like<WH3644> to me; to him you shall listen;<WH8085>

According to all<WH3605> that you desired<WH7592> of the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> in Horeb<WH2722> in the day<WH3117> of the assembly,<WH6951> saying,<WH559> Let me not hear<WH8085> again<WH3254> the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> my God,<WH430> neither<WH3808> let me see<WH7200> this<WH2063> great<WH1419> fire<WH784> any more,<WH5750> that I die<WH4191> not.
And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to me, They have well<WH3190> spoken that which<WH834> they have spoken.<WH1696>

I will raise<WH6965> them up a Prophet<WH5030> from among<WH7130> their brothers,<WH251> like<WH3644> to you, and will put<WH5414> my words<WH1697> in his mouth;<WH6310> and he shall speak<WH1696> to them all<WH3605> that I shall command<WH6680> him.
And it shall come<WH1961> to pass, that whoever<WH376> <WH834> will not listen<WH8085> to my words<WH1697> which<WH834> he shall speak<WH1696> in my name,<WH8034> I will require<WH1875> it of him.

But the prophet,<WH5030> which<WH834> shall presume<WH2102> to speak<WH1696> a word<WH1697> in my name,<WH8034> which I have not commanded<WH6680> him to speak,<WH1696> or that shall speak<WH1696> in the name<WH8034> of other<WH312> gods,<WH430> even that prophet<WH5030> shall die.<WH4191>
And if<WH3588> you say<WH559> in your heart,<WH3824> How<WH349> shall we know<WH3045> the word<WH1697> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> has not spoken?<WH1696>

When<WH834> a prophet<WH5030> speaks<WH1696> in the name<WH8034> of the LORD,<WH3068> if the thing<WH1697> follow<WH1961> not, nor<WH3808> come<WH935> to pass, that is the thing<WH1697> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> has not spoken,<WH1696> but the prophet<WH5030> has spoken<WH1696> it presumptuously:<WH2087> you shall not be afraid<WH1481> of him.
